name: Harrison Klein
what_you_do: Harrison Klein is an international speaker and writer specializing in transformations and awakening processes, producing events and information products for the personal growth, wealth, and development community.
who_you_serve: Individuals and communities interested in spiritual, metaphysical, coaching, personal growth, and wealth development.
offering: Speaking at events, writing, and producing events and information products for the personal growth, wealth, and development industry.
social_proof: Known as the 'Leading Transformational Metaphysical Luminary'; featured in OMTimes Magazine; international speaker.
signature_programs: The Masters Gathering, Women Power and Purpose, True Millionaire Stories, 100MX3, ProAbundance LLC
business_focus: International speaker and event producer focused on personal transformation, spiritual growth, and wealth development.
service_provided: keynote speaking, event production, information products, writing, workshops, webinars
